channel.title: What makes a good pk server?
channel.description:
Do you think a 317 pk server should be:
A place where u make an account, type ::pure, spawn some items, and fight? or A place where you can play minigames, skill, kill bosses, merch, work for you items, and work for your combat levels (train) ?
Just post below what you think.
Thanks -Mr...x..

item.title: What makes a good pk server?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Free 10gp’s + less donater rusher pjers…

Read full topic
item.source: What makes a good pk server?

item.description:
@ipwnu2day wrote:

IDK, but what makes pking fun is when your about to own someone. The owner has all the power so don’t even try to fight him… Especially when they get mad after you beat them and ip bans you for life

item.title: What makes a good pk server?
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:8, topic:380896”]All players able to spawn.
Overpowered items.
Donators get special items that kill everyone.
Admins that abuse.
Mods that abuse.
No banks.
100% Lag all the time.
10% up time.

Perfect server.[/quote]

Most Cammy PvP’s come close to this

Read full topic
item.source: What makes a good pk server?

Overpowered items.
Donators get special items that kill everyone.
Admins that abuse.

No banks.
100% Lag all the time.
10% up time.

Perfect server.
[/quote]Don’t forget:
9 year old server owner
webs.com website
random account resets
epic name like z0mgpk0ZARScapkez
l33t PR0 Hyb1iriding
customer support that only speaks chineese

oh and the most important…
floating donkeys

ah then i need to make my lil bro owner :([/quote]

Should have posted this in February, not July.

item.title: What makes a good pk server?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

There is no definite answer. Generally a PK server is bound to suck. The point of PKing is to be better than somebody else in certain skills and kill other players for items. If you can spawn or you ONLY PK, there is no point in PKing. If you can set your stats, there is no point in being a certain level. I’ll say the second option.

Read full topic
item.source: What makes a good pk server?
